Where's any IP icon to celebrate the event as usual ??!! who came up with the stupid idea of only RP icons, No one with any brains will buy that!!! also the rest of the icons should be gained through missions, Icons are useless in League, the RP icon purchase should end.
Yes, icons are useless; why are you complaining about not getting something that is useless? Why not capitalize on the people without brains who will spend money on useless stuff?
skins are useless too yet everyone buys them....
riot, updating old skins doesn't count as a new skin.  some of these still need new skins. (cough cough mordekaiser yorick cough cough)

They have answered on numerous occassions that while Yorick will indeed be receiving a new skin this year, Morde will not be getting any new skins in the foreseeable future as it would be a HUGE waste of money. 
Morde will not be eligible for a new skin until after his rework, to do it now would be stupid as fuck since they'd need to totally rework a new skin which is unnecessary work and like all champs they need to increase his play rate and player base before it would be worthwhile to add a new skin. I don't know the exact formula, though I'm sure Riot does, but if they give new skins to unplayed champions then it's inefficient, costly, and wasting income whereas if they wait until a champ is more popular then the skin pays for itself on release as there will be enough sales in the beginning to pay for the skin which is the sweet spot for a business like Riot that relies on that sales interaction, they have to make money to survive after all.
so the obvious answer here is to play the dickens out of w/e champ you want a skin for! and bring all your friends to play him/her/it.

LOL Yes but if the champ still needs a rework or is on the radar for one then they will not receive the skin until rework time, even if they hit a 20-50% playrate, such as Swain and Morde who have no hope of receiving a skin before rework and are on the radar for said rework. Once a champ is slated for a rework you can kiss the hopes of getting a new skin goodbye. 
Also it's unlikely that you have ten million friends as so far the sweet spot for champs getting reworks appears to be a regular monthly player base of 10% and in a game of more than ~100 million players with many games on them each month, its very difficult to pump up the numbers enough to skew the data significantly. It also would require keeping the numbers pumped up for 3-6 months or more and hopefully the Morde rework will happen before then. To be honest though I'm not getting my hopes up. LOL
While I agree with you on Yorick, Morde is going to be getting a vgu sometime next season, no point giving him a skin near the end of this one if they're gonna have to update it a few months after.

I mean, I'd like a new Mordekaiser skin.
